name: LinuxAcademyUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: The Linux Academy Weekly Update puts the events of the week into context, has new content to share, and wants to help students and industry professionals stay informed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
